paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.phenotype: pre-symptomatic carriers and patients with axonal polyneuropathy

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Of the 20 enrolled patients, 13 (53%, 10 males, 3 females, mean age 63.4 ± 10.8, age range 46–84) had an axonal polyneuropathy.
Seven subjects were pre-symptomatic carriers of whom 3 women and 4 men (mean age 58.7 ± 13.4, age range 49–88).

functional_data.summary: The Val50Met variant is associated with hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: The most prevalent point mutations were Val50Met (6 subjects), Phe84Leu (5 subjects).
key_quotes: The most prevalent point mutations were Val50Met (6 subjects), Phe84Leu (5 subjects).
Of the 20 enrolled patients, 13 (53%, 10 males, 3 females, mean age 63.4 ± 10.8, age range 46–84) had an axonal polyneuropathy.

tables_processed.table_caption: Demographic data, TTR gene mutation, and neurophysiological data
